response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to revolutionize your operations and significantly enhance your business outcomes. Given its innovative features and unparalleled capabilities, I am confident it could be an invaluable asset to your company.

To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product for a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the chance to experience the benefits of our product without a significant upfront investment.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you require any additional information about how our product can specifically meet your needs. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
